001/**
002 * This controller provides functionality for updating and adding new items to the menu.
003 * @author Isha Virk
004 */
005package src.controller;
006
007import java.sql.Connection;
008import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
009import java.sql.ResultSet;
010
011import static src.controller.useful_functions.switch_scene;
012
013import java.sql.*;
014import src.database.db_connect;
015import src.model.employee;
016
017import java.sql.SQLException;
018
019import javafx.event.ActionEvent;
020import javafx.fxml.FXML;
021import javafx.scene.Scene;
022import javafx.scene.control.TextField;
023
024import javafx.stage.Window;
025import javafx.animation.PauseTransition;
026import javafx.stage.Popup;
027import javafx.util.Duration;
028import javafx.scene.Node;
029import javafx.scene.control.Label;
030
031import java.util.ArrayList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034import src.model.product;
035
036/**
037 * This class provides functionality for updating and adding new items to the menu.
038 */
039public class add_menu_item_controller {
040    /** Text field for the name of the item to be added */
041    @FXML
042    private TextField item_name_field;
043
044    /** Text field for the id of the item */
045    @FXML
046    private TextField item_id_field;
047
048    /** Text field for the price of the item */
049    @FXML
050    private TextField price_field;
051
052    /** Text field for the first ingredient of the item */
053    @FXML
054    private TextField ing1_field;
055
056    /** Text field for the second ingredient of the item */
057    @FXML
058    private TextField ing2_field;
059    
060    /** Text field for the third ingredient of the item */
061    @FXML
062    private TextField ing3_field;
063    
064    /** Text field for the fourth ingredient of the item */
065    @FXML
066    private TextField ing4_field;
067    
068    /** Text field for the fifth ingredient of the item */
069    @FXML
070    private TextField ing5_field;
071
072    /** 
073     * This function handles adding a new item to the menu and updated the price of a pre-existing item
074     * @param event - Input trigger when the manager clicks enter after filling out the information in the above text fields
075     */
076    @FXML 
077    private void handle_enter(ActionEvent event) {
078        String itemName = item_name_field.getText() == null ? "" : item_name_field.getText().trim();
079        String itemId = item_id_field.getText() == null ? "" : item_id_field.getText().trim();
080        String itemPrice = price_field.getText() == null ? "" : price_field.getText().trim();
081        List<String> ingredients = new ArrayList<>();
082        for(TextField field : List.of(ing1_field, ing2_field, ing3_field, ing4_field, ing5_field)){
083            if(field != null && field.getText() != null && !field.getText().trim().isEmpty()){
084                ingredients.add(field.getText().trim());
085            }
086        }
087
088        if(itemName.isEmpty() || itemId.isEmpty() || itemPrice.isEmpty()) {
089            System.out.println("Ensure item name, ID, and price is entered properly.");
090            return;
091        }
092
093        if(Integer.parseInt(itemId) < 100){
094            System.out.println("Invalid Item ID");
095            return;
096        }
097
098        int emptyCheck = 0;
099        for(String ing : ingredients){
100            if(ing.isEmpty()){ emptyCheck++; }
101        }
102
103        // if topping was entered but has ingredients
104        if(Integer.parseInt(itemId) <= 199 && Integer.parseInt(itemId) >= 100 && emptyCheck != 5){ return; }        
105
106        product newItem = new product(Integer.parseInt(itemId), itemName, Float.parseFloat(itemPrice)); 
107
108        try (Connection conn = db_connect.getConnection()) {
109            conn.setAutoCommit(false);
110
111            boolean itemExists = false;
112            
113            // CHECK PRODUCT ID EXISTS
114            PreparedStatement checkIdStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT productid FROM products WHERE productid = ?");
115            checkIdStmt.setInt(1, newItem.getId());
116
117            ResultSet rsId = checkIdStmt.executeQuery();
118
119            if (rsId.next()) {// UPDATE PRICE
120                Popup updatePrice = new Popup();
121                Label msg = new Label("The product with the id " + itemId + " exists. Updating price");
122                //have to manually style this in java
123                msg.setStyle(
124                    "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
125                    "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
126                    "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
127                    "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
128                    "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
129                );
130                updatePrice.getContent().add(msg);
131
132                Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
133                Window window = scene.getWindow();
134
135                // Show, then center near bottom
136                updatePrice.show(window);
137                msg.applyCss();
138                msg.layout();
139                //puts it in the middle ish of the screen
140                updatePrice.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
141                updatePrice.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
142
143                //show for 3 seconds
144                PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(4));
145                delay.setOnFinished(e -> updatePrice.hide());
146                delay.play();
147
148                PreparedStatement newPriceStmt = conn.prepareStatement("UPDATE products SET price = ? WHERE productid = ? RETURNING productid");
149                newPriceStmt.setDouble(1, newItem.getPrice());
150                newPriceStmt.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
151
152                ResultSet rsPrice = newPriceStmt.executeQuery();
153
154                if (rsPrice.next()) {
155                    System.out.println("Price updated successfully!");
156                }
157                else{
158                    System.out.println("Could not update price");
159                }
160
161                System.out.println("Product ID already exists, price updated");
162                conn.commit();
163                conn.close();
164                return;
165            }
166
167            PreparedStatement checkNameStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT productname FROM products WHERE productname = ?");
168            checkNameStmt.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
169
170            ResultSet rsName = checkNameStmt.executeQuery();
171
172            if (rsName.next()) {
173                System.out.println("Product name already exists");
174
175                Popup nameExists = new Popup();
176                Label msg = new Label("The product with the name " + itemName + " exists.");
177                
178                msg.setStyle(
179                    "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
180                    "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
181                    "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
182                    "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
183                    "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
184                );
185                nameExists.getContent().add(msg);
186
187                Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
188                Window window = scene.getWindow();
189
190                
191                nameExists.show(window);
192                msg.applyCss();
193                msg.layout();
194                
195                nameExists.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
196                nameExists.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
197
198                PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(4));
199                delay.setOnFinished(e -> nameExists.hide());
200                delay.play();
201
202                itemExists = true;
203                conn.close();
204                return;
205            }
206
207
208            if(itemExists == false){ // item does not exist: can add!
209                if(newItem.getId() >= 200){ // Adds DRINK
210                    if(emptyCheck == 5){
211                        System.out.println("Drink needs ingredients");
212                        return; 
213                    } 
214
215                    // Check Ingredients
216                    List<Integer> ingIds = new ArrayList<>(); 
217                    for(String ingr : ingredients){
218                        if(ingr.isEmpty()) continue;
219
220                        PreparedStatement checkIngStmt = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientname FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientname = ?");
221                        checkIngStmt.setString(1, ingr);
222
223                        ResultSet rsIng = checkIngStmt.executeQuery();
224                        if (rsIng.next()) { // ing exists
225                            int ingredientId = -1;
226                            System.out.println(ingr + "  exists.");
227                            
228                            PreparedStatement getIngId = conn.prepareStatement("SELECT ingredientid FROM ingredients WHERE ingredientname = ?");
229                            getIngId.setString(1, ingr);
230
231                            ResultSet rsGotIngId = getIngId.executeQuery();
232                            if(rsGotIngId.next()){ // ing exists
233                                ingredientId = rsGotIngId.getInt("ingredientid");
234                                ingIds.add(ingredientId);
235                            }
236                            else{ // ing ID does NOT exist
237                                System.out.println("Invalid ingredient ID");
238                            }
239                        }
240                        else{ 
241                            System.out.println(ingr + "  does not exist. Please add the new ingredient.");
242
243                            Popup addNewNotif = new Popup();
244                            Label msg = new Label("Please add " + ingr + ".");
245                            //have to manually style this in java
246                            msg.setStyle(
247                                "-fx-background-color: rgba(250, 217, 172, 0.85); " +
248                                "-fx-text-fill: #3b261c; " +
249                                "-fx-padding: 12 14; " +
250                                "-fx-background-radius: 12; " +
251                                "-fx-font-size: 32px;"
252                            );
253                            addNewNotif.getContent().add(msg);
254
255                            Scene scene = ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene();
256                            Window window = scene.getWindow();
257
258                            // Show, then center near bottom
259                            addNewNotif.show(window);
260                            msg.applyCss();
261                            msg.layout();
262                            //puts it in the middle ish of the screen
263                            addNewNotif.setX(window.getX() + scene.getWidth() / 2 - msg.getWidth() / 2 + 56);
264                            addNewNotif.setY(window.getY() + scene.getHeight() / 2 - msg.getHeight() / 2);
265
266                            //show for 3 seconds
267                            PauseTransition delay = new PauseTransition(Duration.seconds(3));
268                            delay.setOnFinished(e -> addNewNotif.hide());
269                            delay.play();
270
271                            conn.rollback();
272                            conn.close();
273                            switch_scene("GUI/add_inventory.fxml", event);
274                            return;
275                        }
276                    }
277
278                    // Add product information
279                    PreparedStatement insertProduct = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO products (productname, productid, price) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
280                    insertProduct.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
281                    insertProduct.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
282                    insertProduct.setDouble(3, newItem.getPrice());
283
284                    ResultSet rs2 = insertProduct.executeQuery();
285                    if (rs2.next()) {
286                        System.out.println("Drink added sucessfully");
287                    }
288                    else{
289                        System.out.println("Could not add drink to products");
290                        conn.rollback();
291                        conn.close();
292                        return;
293                    }
294
295                    // INSERT INTO DRINKINGREDIENTS
296                    for(Integer id : ingIds){ 
297                            PreparedStatement insertStmt = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO drinkingredients (productid, ingredientid, quantity) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
298                            insertStmt.setInt(1, newItem.getId());
299                            insertStmt.setInt(2, id);
300                            insertStmt.setFloat(3, 1);
301
302                            ResultSet rs1 = insertStmt.executeQuery();
303                    
304                            if (rs1.next()) {
305                            System.out.println("Ingredient for product added sucessfully");
306                            }
307                            else{
308                                System.out.println("Could not add ingr to drinkingredients");
309                            }
310                    }
311                } // END OF DRINK ADD ON
312                else{
313                    PreparedStatement insertTopping = conn.prepareStatement("INSERT INTO products (productname, productid, price) VALUES (?, ?, ?) RETURNING productid");
314                    insertTopping.setString(1, newItem.getProductName());
315                    insertTopping.setInt(2, newItem.getId());
316                    insertTopping.setDouble(3, newItem.getPrice());
317
318                    ResultSet rs3 = insertTopping.executeQuery();
319
320                    if (rs3.next()) { System.out.println("Topping added sucessfully"); }
321                    else{ System.out.println("Could not add topping to products"); }
322                }
323            }
324            conn.commit();
325            System.out.println("Product added successfully!");
326            conn.close();
327        }
328        catch (SQLException e) {
329            e.printStackTrace();
330        }
331    }
332
333    /**
334     * This handler switches back to the main menu items page
335     * @param event - Input trigger which occurs afrer the user hits the back button
336     */
337    @FXML
338    private void handle_back_click(ActionEvent event) {
339        switch_scene("GUI/menu_items_page.fxml", event);
340    }
341
342    /**
343     * This function clears all the text fields when this page opens
344     */
345    @FXML
346    public void initialize() {
347        // If the page ever re-opens with old text, clear it here
348        if (item_name_field != null) item_name_field.clear();
349        if (item_id_field  != null) item_id_field.clear();
350        if (price_field  != null) price_field.clear();
351        if (ing1_field  != null) ing1_field.clear();
352        if (ing2_field  != null) ing2_field.clear();
353        if (ing3_field  != null) ing3_field.clear();
354        if (ing4_field  != null) ing4_field.clear();
355        if (ing5_field  != null) ing5_field.clear();
356    }
357}
